mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(t.testNo) AllTestCount , ROUND(AVG(t.score)) AllScoreAvg FROM (SELECT test_no testNo , student_no studentNo , score FROM score) t
SELECT COUNT(t.testNo) testCount , ROUND(AVG(t.score)) scoreAvg FROM (SELECT test_no testNo , student_no studentNo , score FROM score) t WHERE t.studentNo = #{studentNo}

SELECT t.test_no testNo , ex.example_idx exampleIdx , ex.example_title exampleTitle , ex.example_ox exampleOx FROM test t INNER JOIN question qu ON t.test_no = qu.test_no INNER JOIN example ex ON qu.question_no = ex.question_no WHERE t.test_no = #{testNo} AND ex.example_ox = '정답'

SELECT t.test_no testNo , t.test_title testTitle , qu.question_no questionNo , qu.question_idx questionIdx , qu.question_title questionTitle , pa.student_no studentNo , pa.answer answer , ex.example_title exampleTitle , ex.example_ox exampleOx , COUNT(case when ex.example_ox = '정답' then 1 END) OVER() oCount , COUNT(qu.question_no) OVER() questionCount , sc.score scoreCk FROM test t INNER JOIN question qu ON t.test_no = qu.test_no INNER JOIN example ex ON qu.question_no = ex.question_no INNER JOIN paper pa ON ex.question_no = pa.question_no INNER JOIN score sc ON pa.student_no = sc.student_no AND t.test_no = sc.test_no WHERE t.test_no = #{testNo} AND pa.student_no = #{studentNo} AND pa.answer = ex.example_idx GROUP BY questionNo ORDER BY questionIdx ASC
SELECT example_no exampleNo , example_idx exampleIdx , example_title exampleTitle , example_ox exampleOx FROM example WHERE question_no = #{questionNo} ORDER BY example_idx ASC
SELECT question_no questionNo , question_idx questionIdx , question_title questionTitle FROM question WHERE test_no = #{testNo} ORDER BY questionIdx ASC
